subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A final appeals officer rejected an appeal by Matt Kenseth after he challenged his two-race suspension by Nascar for intentionally crashing into Joey Logano’s car.
snippet: A final appeals officer rejected an appeal by Matt Kenseth after he challenged his two-race suspension by Nascar for intentionally crashing into Joey Logano’s car.
